summary: FASE 3 Testing Complete - Consulting and Email Alert Subscription features fully functional. All 16 backend API tests passed. All frontend E2E tests passed including form submissions, tab navigation, and status updates.
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
Error handling is implemented with proper toast notifications
seed_data_creation: Test data created during testing: consulting requests (E2E Test User, TEST_* prefixed), email subscribers (e2e_signals_test@example.com, testfase3alerts@example.com)
context_for_next_testing_agent: FASE 3 features fully tested. Consulting page at /consulting works with Personal/Business service type selection, form submission, and success state. Early Signals page at /signals works with Enable Notifications -> email input -> Subscribe flow. Admin page at /admin has all 6 tabs working: Pending, Verified, Users, Feedback, Consulting, Subscribers. Consulting status workflow (new -> contacted -> completed) works with action buttons.

consulting_service_type_selection.details: Personal (default) and Business selection works with visual feedback

consulting_form_submission.details: Form submits with name, email, company (optional), message, service_type

early_signals_page_loads.details: Page loads at /signals with 8 signals displayed

email_alert_subscription.details: Enable Notifications -> email input -> Subscribe flow works

subscription_success_state.details: 'Subscribed to alerts!' displayed with toast notification

admin_consulting_tab.details: Consulting tab shows requests with name, email, company, message, service_type, status badges

admin_subscribers_tab.details: Subscribers tab shows email list with subscription dates

admin_all_tabs.details: All 6 tabs work: Pending, Verified, Users, Feedback, Consulting, Subscribers

consulting_status_update.details: Status workflow (new -> contacted -> completed) works with action buttons and toast notifications
